trans-unit.source: Represents a user annotation in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 表示在使用者註解[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Annotation represents a single annotation with all associated anchoring and content data.
trans-unit.target: 註解表示與所有相關聯的錨定和內容資料的單一註解。

trans-unit.source: An annotation consists of the following main elements.
trans-unit.target: 註解是由下列主要項目所組成。

trans-unit.source: - Zero, one, or more <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> that identify what is being annotated.
trans-unit.target: 是零，一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>，識別哪些所標註。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Zero, one, or more <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> that contain the user data for the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 是零，一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>，其中包含使用者資料的註解。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Zero, one, or more <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> that define who created the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 是零，一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>定義註解的建立者。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CreationTime%2A> that specifies the date and time when the annotation was created.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CreationTime%2A>指定的日期和時間時建立的附註。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CreationTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.LastModificationTime%2A> that specifies when the annotation was last updated.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.LastModificationTime%2A>，指定上次更新註解。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.LastModificationTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A unique annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> (a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: -唯一註解<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>( [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)])。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> class that has a specified type name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>有指定的型別名稱和命名空間的類別。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for the annotation.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]的註解。

trans-unit.source: The date and time the annotation was first created.
trans-unit.target: 建立日期和時間的註解是第一次。

trans-unit.source: The date and time the annotation was last modified.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間，上次修改註解。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於加入、 移除或修改清單中的註解<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>錨點

trans-unit.source: In addition to when an anchor is added or removed, AnchorChanged occurs on any modifications to an anchor subpart, such as a change to a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>.
trans-unit.target: 當錨點加入或移除時，除了 AnchorChanged，就會發生任何錨點子零件，例如變更至<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>修改

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of zero or more <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> anchor elements that define the data selection(s) being annotated.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的零或多個<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>錨定項目會定義所標註的資料選擇。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource> in the Anchors collection identifies a data selection to which the annotation is bound (in other words, "the data selection that is being annotated").
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource>錨點的集合會識別的選取註解所繫結資料 （亦即，「 資料選取範圍標註"）。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource>

trans-unit.source: While most annotations refer to a single data selection and contain just one anchor <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource>, multiple anchors can occur if a single annotation refers to multiple data selections.
trans-unit.target: 雖然大部分註解是指單一資料選取範圍，而且包含一個錨點<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource>，如果單一註解是指複選資料可能會發生多個錨點。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource>

trans-unit.source: The returned Anchors collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 傳回錨點集合永遠不會是 null。不過，此集合可能包含零個元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection of zero or more <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> anchor elements.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個集合<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>錨定項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> of the annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>的註解類型。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: The returned annotation type is the <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> name passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回註解型別是<xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>名稱傳遞為參數，以<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > AnnotationType returns `null` if the annotation was incorrectly constructed by using a default constructor without parameters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AnnotationType 傳回`null`如果註解不正確建構使用不含參數的預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: (The default constructor without parameters does not fully initialize the instance and is used only internally in combination with XML serialization.) To create a new annotation, applications should use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.%23ctor%2A> constructor that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: (不含參數的預設建構函式不會完全初始化執行個體和只在內部使用 XML 序列化搭配。)若要建立新的註釋，應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.%23ctor%2A>建構函式<xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>做為參數。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML qualified name for this kind of annotation.
trans-unit.target: 這類的註解的 XML 限定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors*>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於加入、 移除或修改清單中的註解<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors*>作者

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of zero or more author strings that identify who created the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串的零或多個作者的集合，識別建立者<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The returned Authors collection is never `null`; however, the collection can contain zero elements if no author is specified.
trans-unit.target: 不會傳回的作者集合`null`; 不過，集合可以包含零個元素，如果沒有作者指定。

trans-unit.source: A collection of zero or more author strings.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個作者字串的集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos*>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於加入、 移除或修改清單中的註解<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos*>貨物

trans-unit.source: In addition to when a cargo is added or removed, CargoChanged occurs on any modification to a cargo subpart, such as a change to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> in the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Contents%2A> collection of a cargo.
trans-unit.target: 當貨物加入或移除時，除了上貨物子零件，例如若要變更的任何修改都會發生 CargoChanged<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>中<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Contents%2A>貨物的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Contents%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of zero or more <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> cargo elements that contain data for the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的零或多個<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>貨物項目包含的註解的資料。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource> in the Cargos collection contains user-defined data for the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource>在 Cargos 集合包含使用者定義資料的註解。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource>

trans-unit.source: The returned Cargos collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements if there is no user data for the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 Cargos 集合永遠不會是 null。不過，如果沒有使用者資料的註解集合可能包含零個元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection of zero or more <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> cargo elements.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個集合<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>貨物項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and the time that the annotation was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得日期和時間所建立的註解。

trans-unit.source: The date and the time the annotation was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立註解的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[註解結構描述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如結構描述的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[註解結構描述](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md)如結構描述的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)]註解。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and the time that the annotation was last modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得日期和上次修改註解的時間。

trans-unit.source: The date and the time the annotation was last modified.
trans-unit.target: 上次修改註解的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> from a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>從指定的<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The XML reader to use to deserialize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 若要用來還原序列化註解 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: The serialized XML for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的 XML <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref>不正確。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the annotation to a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化至指定的<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>註釋

trans-unit.source: The XML writer to use to serialize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 要用來序列化註解的 XML 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType*> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType*>不正確。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType*>
